    • Method Detail

      • put

        public boolean put(File file,
          String gridPath,
          StoragePolicy sp)
        Description copied from interface: GridFacade
        Asynchronous call. Puts a file from the local file system into the grid.
        Specified by:
        put in interface GridFacade
        Overrides:
        put in class IrodsGridFacade
        Parameters:
        file - full path to a file location which should be ingested into the grid
        gridPath - address of the target file name in grid (excluding zone prefix) If @param gridPath parent Folder does not exist, it will be created.
        Returns:
        true if file has been successfully copied to the grid cache area, the file has been successfully registered at the working resource and the replication command has been fired.
        false if one of the abovementioned conditions has not been met. put can be called again after returning false.
